Rodimus:

"What do you suggest?" said gloomy Rodimus while he watched 
Nighlight-Sedna sleep






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <CatMastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Nighlight/Rodimus:::
> > 
> > "A VORK!!!! SO ARE THEY BACK??? WHAT DID SHE SAY????? WHY IS SHE 
> > CONTROLING HER???"said shocked Rodimus while she took in arms 
his 
> > wife who was now in a deep sleep
> > 
> "I'm afraid it didn't specify.  When I refused to open the door to 
the
> analyzing chamber it tried to escape.  That's when the fight that 
you
> saw broke out,"  Kenzo stated.  "It would be dangerous to leave
> Nightlight unrestrained like this, if the Vork recovers it might 
attack."
